snippet.title: Mint's Hints 2 | Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3253140/Mints_Hints_2/
ITCH.IO: https://grantmarrs.itch.io/mints-hints-2
SHOP: https://mintshints.com/
PATREON: patreon.com/mintshints

Mint's Hints is a beloved childrens' show that was cancelled - but behind-the-scenes of the abandoned set is a harrowing plot designed to destroy lives in the name of profit. Spirits and other creatures now lurk the old studio, leaving you unsure of who to trust. Navigate the set, learn the truth behind the closure of the show, and try to escape once and for all. Can you collect all the hints and reactivate Android Mint before time runs out?
